Package org.wmn4j.notation

Enum Class PitchClass

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Enum<PitchClass>
org.wmn4j.notation.PitchClass
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Comparable<PitchClass>, Constable
public enum PitchClass extends Enum<PitchClass>
Represents the 12 pitch classes in equal-temperament tuning.
